mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, G.SCORE, G.Test_DATE FROM USER U, Gds G WHERE G.GDSUSER_ID = U.USER_ID
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO Gds (GDSUSER_ID, USER_NAME, SCORE, TEST_DATE) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{score}, NOW() )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE SCORE = VALUES(SCORE), TEST_DATE = VALUES(TEST_DATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE Gds SET USER_NAME = #{userName}, SCORE = #{score}, NOW() WHERE GDSUSER_ID = #{userId}
